body_html:
@tho15 @vade : Could you add -ltensorflow_framework to your g++ command-line and see if that helps?

If not, please do paste the error along with the command you tried as I suspect the errors change. For example, in #14632 - adding -ltensorflow_cc would have changed the errors from what was initially reported.

Anyway, please do try with -ltensorflow_framework and let us know what happens. Thanks.
